item.title: About Leif Madsen
item.description: I currently work at Red Hat on the NFV (Network Functions Virtualization) partner engineering team as the DevOps lead. In this role I work with telecommunication partners to automate and test their NFV platforms. In a previous life, I was an Asterisk consultant, starting professionally in 2004 (learning Asterisk in September 2002). I’m co-author of the O’Reilly Media published books, Asterisk: The Future of Telephony 1st and 2nd editions (along with Jared Smith and Jim van Meggelen), Asterisk: The Definitive Guide (3rd and 4th editions) with Jim van Meggelen and Russell Bryant, and the Asterisk Cookbook with Russell Bryant.
